n = int(input())

l = list(map(int, input().split()))

if max(l) < sum(l)-max(l):
    print("Yes")
else:
    print("No")

L = list(map(int, input().split()))
L.sort()

if L[0] + L[1] > L[-1]:
    print("Yes")
else:
    print("No")


n = int(input())

l = list(map(int, input().split()))
s = sum(l)
if max(l) < s-max(l):
    print("Yes")
else:
    print("No")
